meanings.definition: Moving or proceeding at a very high speed.
meanings.sent1: The breakneck race cars zoomed around the track.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride was breakneck, thrilling everyone on board.
meanings.sent3: The breakneck squirrel raced up the tree, leaving the other animals in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her breakneck typing speed amazed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The breakneck river currents made it impossible to swim across.

meanings.sent1: The breakneck winds threatened to blow away the flimsy tent.
meanings.sent2: The breakneck descent down the mountain was both exhilarating and terrifying.
meanings.sent3: The breakneck toddler ran around the house, causing chaos wherever he went.
meanings.sent4: His breakneck decision-making often led to unexpected outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The breakneck pace of the city was a stark contrast to the quiet countryside.
